about.title: Full Stack Developer
about.paragraph: My journey in the programming universe is guided by a passion for solving problems. With each line of code, I see an opportunity to create innovative and impactful solutions. With dedication and enthusiasm, I constantly seek to improve my skills to tackle challenges and contribute to technological development.

descriptions.howstheweather: Made with React that consumes a weather API and shows weather information for any city.
descriptions.habituai: Habit management application with gamification made in React.
descriptions.spotifytomp3: Python script that downloads songs from a Spotify playlist via YouTube.
descriptions.blog: My personal blog which I post about tech and other stuff.
